description: Disables the SMS channel for an application and deletes any existing settings for the channel.

parameters.name: ApplicationId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the application. This identifier is displayed as the Project ID on the Amazon Pinpoint console.

nested_items.name: SMSChannelResponse
nested_items.description: Provides information about the status and settings of the SMS channel for an application.

nested_items.name: ApplicationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the application that the SMS channel applies to.

nested_items.name: CreationDate
nested_items.description: The date and time, in ISO 8601 format, when the SMS channel was enabled.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the SMS channel is enabled for the application.

nested_items.name: HasCredential
nested_items.description: (Not used) This property is retained only for backward compatibility.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: (Deprecated) An identifier for the SMS channel. This property is retained only for backward compatibility.

nested_items.name: IsArchived
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the SMS channel is archived.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedBy
nested_items.description: The user who last modified the SMS channel.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The date and time, in ISO 8601 format, when the SMS channel was last modified.

nested_items.name: Platform
nested_items.description: The type of messaging or notification platform for the channel. For the SMS channel, this value is SMS.

nested_items.name: PromotionalMessagesPerSecond
nested_items.description: The maximum number of promotional messages that you can send through the SMS channel each second.

nested_items.name: SenderId
nested_items.description: The identity that displays on recipients' devices when they receive messages from the SMS channel.

nested_items.name: ShortCode
nested_items.description: The registered short code to use when you send messages through the SMS channel.

nested_items.name: TransactionalMessagesPerSecond
nested_items.description: The maximum number of transactional messages that you can send through the SMS channel each second.

nested_items.name: Version
nested_items.description: The current version of the SMS channel.
